message.content:
cs.LG, cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.EC. 

The paper deals with a multi-armed bandit problem with movement costs and applies it to an adaptive pricing problem. The main focus is on developing a new algorithm and analyzing its performance in terms of regret. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.GT (Game Theory), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), and cs.EC (Economics and Computation).
